metadata.title: CVE-2021-20311 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in versions before 7.0.11, where a divisionby zero in sRGBTransformImage() in the MagickCore/colorspace.c may triggerundefined behavior via a crafted image file that is submitted by anattacker processed by an application using ImageMagick. The highest threatfrom this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
